modName: Altairs dagger from Assassins Creed_one-handed nonreplacer
descriptionHtml:
Instalation: Drag the data-folder into Skyrims main directory
Description: Wield the dagger of one of the assassins and become as deadly as him. With Altair\'s dagger become one with the eagle, slay all your foes in one deadly dance.

How to obtain: This weapon is only avilible throu smithing so far and the recipe is unlocked along with the Ebony smithing perk.

Components required:1 Ebony ingot, 1 steel ingot och 1 hawk feather.
Upgrading the weapon requires 1 ebony ingot.

Weapons stats
Damade: 12
Crit. damage: 7
Crit. Chance: 2%
Value: 450
Weight: 5

Made by Shrinkingcash and his fellow assistant PR95 who does the description writing.
author: Shrinkingcash
